segments.text: Yeah . You don't need to rub it in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And then she made the deal with MicroPower . Vince wanted to sell for fifteen million ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fifteen ? And Zina pushed them up to seventy-five ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Vince still stops by her office every day to thank her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyway , I'm still happy I left . I'm working as a freelancer now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really should have stayed with us , Dave .
segments.speaker: S2
